title: Maokai Sapling Bug
body: Moakai's saplings proc the execute and gold collection effect on face of the mountain and it's ingredients. The item states that it should be activated only by melee attacks.

replies.body: it gives it to the last hit dmg, if you last hit with a blitz crank q and an ally is close enough, it will give them the money, eat a minion as tahm, throw it at them, they get it, flay a minion as thresh they get it. not a bug.

Resolute smite also does this, among half a dozen other abilities i have personally seen do this.

Nobody plays them support, so nobody notices. Shhhh..
